findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The smart contract owner can add and remove admins, which allows them to mint an unlimited number of tokens without any restrictions.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The contract allows an unauthorized script upgrade which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Insecure transfer function
findings.description: The 'transfer' function executes transfers of a specified number of tokens to a specified address, which may lead to potential out-of-gas and resource exhaustion errors with multi-wallet calls.

findings.title: Insecure allowance function
findings.description: The allowance function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper validation.

findings.title: Insecure approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows an attacker to drain the token balance of another user.

findings.title: Insecure transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper validation or access control.

findings.title: Insecure increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function has a potential security vulnerability.

findings.title: Insecure decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function has a vulnerability that can lead to unintended behavior.
